item.title: Set of drawers and other rubbish abandoned, 28th February
item.description:
This large set of drawers and other rubbish has been left on our street outside this small park. Fly tipping at this location occurs multiple times every week and itâ€™s not acceptable. Please can cctv cameras be installed to reduce this illegal activity

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bushberry Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Fly Tipped rubbish bags and other items, 28th February
item.description:
In the public walkway/alleyway behind the houses on Longmeadow Road. This can attract rats and other rodents so needs to be removed ASAP. This has been going on for some months so action needs to be taken.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Longmeadow Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
